title: Inflation rate in Lithuania 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 21 data points.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 11.16 was reported at Year 2008
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 0.24 was reported at Year 2014
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 21 data points.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
mid_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 21 data points.

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 21 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 11.16 was reported at Year 2008
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 0.24 was reported at Year 2014

The line drastically increased by 2.3 times from Year 2004 to 2005,increased by 1.9 times from Year 2007 to 2008,decreased by 3.5 times from Year 2009 to 2010,increased by 3.5 times from Year 2010 to 2011,decreased by 4.8 times from Year 2013 to 2014,increased by 2.8 times from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, increased by 5.5 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
